fullplot: What price would you pay for freedom? In the exhilarating action epic FOR GREATER GLORY, an impassioned group of men and women make the decision to risk it all for family, faith and country. This film unfolds the (hidden) true story of 1920's Cristeros War.
plot: A chronicle of the Cristeros War (1926-1929); a war by the people of Mexico against the atheistic Mexican government.
title: For Greater Glory: The True Story of Cristiada

tomatoes.consensus: It has laudable aspirations, but For Greater Glory ultimately fails to fulfill its goals due to an overstuffed script, thinly written characters, and an overly simplified dramatization of historical events.
